description: SSP-based RCP scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway with SSP5 socioeconomic conditions. Concentration-driven.  Radiative effects of CO2 disabled - i.e. the radiation code is fed the time-invariant CO2 concentration from the control run.
keywords: C4MIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP5, RCP8.5, concentration-driven, 1850 CO2 for radiation
long_name: biogeochemically-coupled version of the updated emission-driven RCP8.5 based on SSP5
rationale: Assessment of CO2-carbon cycle feedbacks over the 21st century and assessment of CO2 induced warming.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description: Impose repeating 1850 carbon dioxide (CO2) concentrations to radiative code.
requirements.keywords: 1850, CO2, concentration, pre-industrial, radiation code only
requirements.label: 1850CO2Radiation

requirements.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
requirements.label: RCP85Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a fully coupled Earth system model
requirements.label: ESM Configuration
